description.p: Python is a high-level, interactive, object-oriented language. Its 3.9 version includes an extensive class library with lots of goodies for network programming, system administration, sounds and graphics.

maintainer-scripts.postinst:
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python3" ]; then ln -sf "python3.9" "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python3" fi
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python" ]; then ln -sf "python3.9" "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python" fi
maintainer-scripts.postrm:
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python3" ]; then rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python3" fi
if [ ! -e "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python" ]; then rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python" fi
